bibl.title: Letter from James Carroll to Howard A. Kelly, January 6, 1907

div1.p: Carroll sends a note of gratitude for Kelly's letter to Secretary Wilson.

div1.head: Letter from James Carroll to Howard A. Kelly, January 6, 1907
div1.p:
I have
recently been permitted
to read a copy of your
letter to Sec'y Wilson.

Permit me to thank
you, in the name of my
family, for the courage,
candor, honesty and the
spirit of true Christian
justice you have dis-
played. I fully
appreciate the situation and I
honor you more than ever.

With heartfelt wishes for a
happy and prosperous new year, believe
me,
div1.closer: Sincerely and gratefully yours, James Carroll. Dr Howard A. Kelly.
